properties.name: org.erola.spring.boot.netty.httprouter.caseSensitive
properties.description: 路径匹配是否区分大小写

properties.name: org.erola.spring.boot.netty.httprouter.usePathCache
properties.description: 路径匹配是否启用缓存

properties.name: org.erola.spring.boot.netty.httprouter.pathCacheMaxCount
properties.description: 路径匹配启用缓存时的最大记录数，超过时按照LRU规则进行淘汰
